Method Detail

getUser

@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
User getUser(java.lang.String userId)
Obtain a PAT user object from the database.

Parameters:
userId - The id of the user we want.
Returns:
The corresponding user object, null if none found by that name.

getUsers

@Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
java.util.List<User> getUsers()
Loads a list of all users from the database.

Returns:
A List object of all users. Could be an empty list.

createUser

@Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
void createUser(User user)
Adds a user object to the database.

Parameters:
user - The user to create.

updateUser

@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
void updateUser(User user)
Updates a user object in the database.

Parameters:
user - The user that contains the modifications to save.

deleteUser

@Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
void deleteUser(java.lang.String userId)
Deletes a user from the database.

Parameters:
userId - The user id to delete.

getSavedConnection

@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
SavedConnection getSavedConnection(java.lang.String userId,
                                           java.lang.String connectionName)
Retreives a saved connection object from the database.

Parameters:
userId - The owner id of the connection.
connectionName - The connection unique name.
Returns:
The connection object, null if none found for those criteria.
